briefdescription.para: A short-cut to get the non-const transforms attribute slot.

simplesect.para: The attribute slot of the non-const transforms.

briefdescription.para: A short-cut to get the const transforms attribute slot.

simplesect.para: The attribute slot of the const transforms.

briefdescription.para: Get the positions of the vertices.
A short cut to get the positions of the vertices.
A wrapper of the vertices and its attributes of the simplicial complex.
A wrapper of the edges and its attributes of the simplicial complex.
A wrapper of the triangles and its attributes of the simplicial complex.
A wrapper of the tetrahedra and its attributes of the simplicial complex.
Get the dimension of the simplicial complex.

detaileddescription.para: Return the maximum dimension of the simplices in the simplicial complex.

briefdescription.para: A simplicial complex is a collection of simplices.

detaileddescription.para: In $\mathbb{R}^3$, a simplicial complex is defined as follows: $$ K = (V, E, F, T), $$ where $V$ is the set of vertices, $E$ is the set of edges, $F$ is the set of triangles, and $T$ is the set of tetrahedra.
